subtitle: Learn to code and pilot a Parrot drone in Swift!

additionalInformation.value: English, German, French, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, and Latin American Spanish.
additionalInformation.name: Languages:

title: Parrot Education
description:
In this playground you will learn how to program and pilot your Parrot drone using the power of Swift code! You will learn how to takeoff, land, move in all directions, make acrobatic figures, and even control accessories.

Supported drone models include: Rolling Spider, Airborne, and Mambo.
